summary.span: 包括從 中的工作流程執行個體上擷取的資料之篩選條件。

span.span: Contains filter criteria for data extracted from a workflow instance in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 指定從工作流程擷取之資料片段的值。A specifies the value of a piece of data extracted from a workflow. 它可用來限制 在查詢 使用的追蹤資料庫時傳回的 物件集合。It is used to constrain the set of objects returned by in a query of the tracking data base used by a . 您可以將 物件加入至 ，以指定 傳回的 物件集合必須符合具有指定之擷取資料的集合。You can add objects to to specify that the set of objects returned by be constrained to those possessing the specified set of extracted data.
